definitions.definition: Of or relating to a class of Greek and Latin nouns that may refer to males or females but have a fixed grammatical gender ( feminine , masculine , neuter , etc.).
Of or relating to nouns or pronouns in any language that have a single form for male and female referents .
Suitable for use regardless of sex ; unisex .
Of indeterminate sex , whether asexual , androgynous , hermaphrodite , or intersex ; of a human face, intermediate in form between a man's face and a woman's face.

main_definition: ( linguistics ) Of or relating to a class of Greek and Latin nouns that may refer to males or females but have a fixed grammatical gender ( feminine , masculine , neuter , etc.).
secondary_definitions: ( linguistics ) Of or relating to nouns or pronouns in any language that have a single form for male and female referents .
( by extension ) Suitable for use regardless of sex ; unisex .
( biology and figuratively ) Of indeterminate sex , whether asexual , androgynous , hermaphrodite , or intersex ; of a human face, intermediate in form between a man's face and a woman's face.
( by extension , usually derogatory ) Of a man: effeminate .
